@Clemenator i have win7 x64 too and the game work %100 try to update your graphic card driver and turn off the anti-virus you have then install.

q for the uploader: is the videos in the game compressed ?

@kszb, thanks for the advice I already have nvidia's latest driver 306.97, turned of malewarebytes & kaspersky.. No dif. dx  all that is upto date & I am playing boarderlands 2, xcom, fifa 13, pes 13 with no prob.. Anyways not to concerned i understand that every pc is diff & it might be as simple as one setting or a troublesome as my wife.. What works for one dose not always work for the other.. plus its free :) 
Anyways thank T.F.K u do great work but on this occasion I will try a diff download.. :)(:
can anyone please tell me the installation process?? The Data.bin file cant be read by POWER ISO. what do i do? Plz help.
sorry about my previous comment guys. The torrent works fine. Just click on the set up, and sit and enjoy. game works great!
